Gravity Alumni

We are proud of our alumni who now meaningfully contribute to different sectors of society all around the world.

Please visit our Student Training page to check out the group activities we conduct to help foster critical thinking and develop strong analytical skills in all of our members.

Karlo De Leon

MS Physics (2021), BS Physics (2019)
After Gravity: New York University, MacCracken PhD fellow in Physics (soft matter physics)

Lizbeth Tan

BS Physics (2020)
After Gravity: University of Maryland Baltimore County, PhD student in Physics (high energy astrophysics)

Joshua Bautista

MS Physics (2021), BS Physics (2019)
After Gravity: University of Virginia, PhD student in Physics (theoretical astrophysics, gravity)

Gabriel Alkuino

MS Physics (2021), BS Physics (2019)
After Gravity: Syracuse University, Harry Levinstein PhD fellow in Physics (soft matter physics)

Clark Urzo

BS Physics (2020)
After Gravity: private sector

Mark Ugalino

MS Physics (2020), BS Physics (2018)
After Gravity: University of Massachusetts Dartmouth, PhD student in Engineering and Applied Science (computational astrophysics and scientific computing)

Noel Vargas

MS Physics (2018)
After Gravity: Instructor in the Department of Physics, Ateneo de Manila University

Sam Alcoriza

MS Physics (2018)
After Gravity: private sector

Jezreel Castillo

MS Physics (2017)
After Gravity: University of North Carolina Chapel Hill, PhD fellow in Physics (gravitational waves and theoretical astrophysics); previously in the Abdus Salam ICTP High Energy Diploma Programme (2018)

After Gravity: intellectual property and technology specialist, Fortun Narvasa & Salazar - Pinoy IP Works Inc
